title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Learner-Controlled Online Video-Based Statistics Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply fundamental statistical concepts to solve real-world data analysis problems
Learners can flexibly adjust learning strategies according to their level of self-regulated control

Graduate learners complete 3+ weekly video lectures (30+ minutes each) on online platforms (Coursera, K-MOOC, etc.) over six months, maintain weekly learning logs (500+ characters), incorporate peer feedback (≥2 instances), achieve ≥80% learning plan compliance, and demonstrate ≥20% improvement (minimum +1 point) in self-directed learning competency scores via pre-post self-assessment surveys (5-point Likert scale, 15 items)
Learners can cultivate team collaboration and statistical interpretation skills through project-based assignments
Learners can objectively demonstrate their ability to apply statistical knowledge through summative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
